com.skysql.java

Class GsonSystem.Systems

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skysql.java.GsonSystem.Systems
  • Enclosing class:
    GsonSystem

    public static class GsonSystem.Systems
extends java.lang.Object
    The system API main subclass. The corresponding JSON object is called either systems (if it's a list) or system if it's a single object.
    Author:
    Massimo Siani
